title: Is the 2026 FIFA World Cup schedule at risk? FIFA addresses relocation fears amid rising security concerns
summary_full: Security concerns in parts of Mexico have raised questions about whether 2026 FIFA World Cup matches could be relocated. FIFA says it is closely monitoring the situation with authorities and prioritizes safety. Officials stress that moving games would be a last resort, and the tournament across the United States, Canada, and Mexico remains scheduled as planned.
